data.description: Framework for Rendering HTML Bar Charts
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The name space choice can be easily pulled from the description of
    the module. "A module that renders Bar Charts in HTML", the
    namespace "HTML::BarChart" just seems intuatively corrisponding to
    the module's function. To my knowledge and as of searching
    cpan.perl.org, I dont see any other modules which accomplish this
    task. And although it is not a horrendously difficult task to
    achieve, using the module is alot more simple (and alot more
    painless) than doing it manually :)
